title: Request Faculty Parking Permit
description: A new faculty member needs to get a parking permit for a campus garage.

tasks.description: Identify the employee and verify their eligibility for a faculty parking permit.
Guide the employee to the parking and transportation website to purchase the permit online.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct URL for self-service.

tasks.description: Explain how the cost of the permit will be handled via payroll deduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the payment process.
